about_the_game:
Astro Engineers is a co-op puzzle game for both virtual reality and desktop where you have to solve puzzles, work together and explore to complete different missions. Play together with players across multiple platforms from anywhere in the world. By exploring the levels together you can find unique solutions to puzzles and secret collectables.

In either VR or non-vr the game provides a unique experience and allows all players to work together so no friend is left behind.


Solve unique puzzles to complete different levels. Remember sequences, calculate formulas and platform together with your friends. Try and interact with everything, the solution is somewhere.



Work together to complete the mission, because why not double, triple or quadruple the fun?



Different missions take you along different locations with each telling a different story. Can you find all the secrets and solve the big puzzle?



Unique tools give each player in the group a task to fulfill so you have to be strategic with who goes where in each puzzle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Specs are for VR, lower specs may work for Non-VR.
